original_title: La Polizia Interviene: Ordine Di Uccidere
overview: After a couple of 'special squad' cops are gunned down while chasing some kidnappers, the head of the squad takes it really personally! His violent path to find the kidnappers leads him to the upper echelons of the government. Now, the powers-that-be don't want to be found out and decide it's time to kill one more cop...
title: The Left Hand of the Law
